languages.text: {n}Следующий планетарный цикл дорого стоил Даргонусу. Успев стянуть силы, культ выродков ударил в ответ. Буйствующие орды выродков, саботаж и взрывы, перестрелки унесли тысячи лучших слуг династии. Но исход был предрешен, и нечистые капища еретиков запылали.{/n}

{n}The next planetary cycle brought heavy losses for Dargonus. Mustering additional forces, the heretic cult struck back. The raging hordes of degenerates, sabotage, explosions, and skirmishes claimed the lives of thousands of the dynasty's best servants. But the outcome was predetermined, and the filthy shrines of the heretics were set ablaze.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Следующий планетарный цикл дорого стоил Даргонусу. Успев стянуть силы, культ выродков ударил в ответ. Буйствующие орды выродков, саботаж и взрывы, перестрелки унесли тысячи лучших слуг династии. Но исход был предрешен, и нечистые капища еретиков запылали.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The next planetary cycle brought the heavy losses for Dargonus. Bringing the additional forces, the anathema cult had struck back. The raging hordes of the degenerates, sabotages and explosions, and skirmishes have taken the lives of thousands of the best dynasty servants. But the outcome had been predetermined, and the filthy shrines of the heretics were set alight.{/n}

languages.text: {n}在接下来的行星周期之中，达戈努斯遭受了巨大的损失。异端分子聚集起了更加强大的力量进行反击，狂暴的变种人群、破坏、爆炸与小规模冲突，夺去了数千名王朝最优秀仆人的生命。但即便如此，结果也早已注定，异端邪恶的神殿最终被付之一炬。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The next planetary cycle brought heavy losses for Dargonus. Mustering additional forces, the heretic cult struck back. The raging hordes of degenerates, sabotage, explosions, and skirmishes claimed the lives of thousands of the dynasty's best servants. But the outcome was predetermined, and the filthy shrines of the heretics were set ablaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}在接下来的行星周期之中，达戈努斯遭受了巨大的损失。异端分子聚集起了更加强大的力量进行反击，狂暴的变种人群、破坏、爆炸与小规模冲突，夺去了数千名王朝最优秀仆人的生命。但即便如此，结果也早已注定，异端邪恶的神殿最终被付之一炬。{/n}
{n}在接下来的行星周期之中，达戈努斯遭受了巨大的损失。异端组织投入了更大力量进行了反击，狂暴的变种人群、破坏、爆炸与小规模冲突，夺去了数千名王朝最优秀仆人的生命。但即便如此，结果也早已注定，异端邪恶的神殿最终被付之一炬。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El siguiente ciclo planetario estuvo repleto de pérdidas para Dargonus. El culto hereje reunió fuerzas adicionales para contraatacar. Las furiosas hordas de las aberraciones, junto con los sabotajes, los atentados y las escaramuzas, se cobraron la vida de miles de los mejores sirvientes de la dinastía. Pero el final era inevitable: los abominables santuarios de los herejes acabaron envueltos en llamas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The next planetary cycle brought heavy losses for Dargonus. Mustering additional forces, the heretic cult struck back. The raging hordes of degenerates, sabotage, explosions, and skirmishes claimed the lives of thousands of the dynasty's best servants. But the outcome was predetermined, and the filthy shrines of the heretics were set ablaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El siguiente ciclo planetario estuvo repleto de pérdidas para Dargonus. El culto hereje reunió fuerzas adicionales para contraatacar. Las furiosas hordas de las aberraciones, junto con los sabotajes, los atentados y las escaramuzas, se cobraron la vida de miles de los mejores sirvientes de la dinastía. Pero el final era inevitable: los abominables santuarios de los herejes acabaron envueltos en llamas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}次の惑星サイクルはダルゴナスに大きな損失を与えた。異端魔女団はさらなる勢力を投入し、反撃に出た。激怒した堕落者の大群、妨害や爆発、小競り合いによって、王朝の数千人の最良の従者たちが命を落とした。しかし、この結末はあらかじめ決められていたのだ。異端者たちの不浄な聖堂は燃え上がった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The next planetary cycle brought heavy losses for Dargonus. Mustering additional forces, the heretic cult struck back. The raging hordes of degenerates, sabotage, explosions, and skirmishes claimed the lives of thousands of the dynasty's best servants. But the outcome was predetermined, and the filthy shrines of the heretics were set ablaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}次の惑星サイクルはダルゴナスに大きな損失を与えた。異端魔女団はさらなる勢力を投入し、反撃に出た。激怒した堕落者の大群、妨害や爆発、小競り合いによって、王朝の数千人の最良の従者たちが命を落とした。しかし、この結末はあらかじめ決められていたのだ。異端者たちの不浄な聖堂は燃え上がった。{/n}
{n}次の惑星サイクルはダルゴナスに大きな損失を与えた。異端魔女団はさらなる勢力を投入し、反撃に出た。激怒した堕落者の大群、妨害や爆発、小競り合いによって、王朝の数千人の最良の従者たちが命を落とした。しかし、この結末はあらかじめ決められていたのだ。異端者たちの不浄な聖堂は燃え上がった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Lors du cycle planétaire suivant, Dargonus subit de lourdes pertes. Recevant des renforts, les hérétiques ripostent... Leurs hordes enragées, les sabotages, les explosions et les embuscades prennent la vie de milliers de serviteurs de la dynastie. Malgré cela, ils ne peuvent échapper à leur sort et les sanctuaires des hérétiques sont donnés en pâture aux flammes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The next planetary cycle brought heavy losses for Dargonus. Mustering additional forces, the heretic cult struck back. The raging hordes of degenerates, sabotage, explosions, and skirmishes claimed the lives of thousands of the dynasty's best servants. But the outcome was predetermined, and the filthy shrines of the heretics were set ablaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Lors du cycle planétaire suivant, Dargonus subit de lourdes pertes. Recevant des renforts, les hérétiques ripostent... Leurs hordes enragées, les sabotages, les explosions et les embuscades prennent la vie de milliers de serviteurs de la dynastie. Malgré cela, ils ne peuvent échapper à leur sort et les sanctuaires des hérétiques sont donnés en pâture aux flammes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der nächste planetare Zyklus brachte gewaltige Verluste auf Dargonus mit sich. Der ketzerische Kult rief Verstärkung und schlug zurück. Tausende der besten Diener der Dynastie starben durch die marodierenden Horden von Mutanten, durch Sabotage und Explosionen. Doch der Ausgang war vorherbestimmt, und die widerlichen Schreine der Ketzer wurden in Brand gesteckt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The next planetary cycle brought heavy losses for Dargonus. Mustering additional forces, the heretic cult struck back. The raging hordes of degenerates, sabotage, explosions, and skirmishes claimed the lives of thousands of the dynasty's best servants. But the outcome was predetermined, and the filthy shrines of the heretics were set ablaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der nächste planetare Zyklus brachte gewaltige Verluste auf Dargonus mit sich. Der ketzerische Kult rief Verstärkung und schlug zurück. Tausende der besten Diener der Dynastie starben durch die marodierenden Horden von Mutanten, durch Sabotage und Explosionen. Doch der Ausgang war vorherbestimmt, und die widerlichen Schreine der Ketzer wurden in Brand gesteckt.{/n}

{n}Der nächste planetare Zyklus brachte gewaltige Verluste auf Dargonus mit sich. Der Ketzerkult hatte Verstärkung gerufen und schlug zurück. Tausende der besten Diener der Dynastie starben durch die marodierenden Horden von Mutanten, durch Sabotage und Explosionen. Doch der Ausgang war vorherbestimmt, und die widerlichen Schreine der Ketzer wurden in Brand gesetzt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Gezegenin bir sonraki döngüsü, beraberinde Dargonus'a ağır bir zayiat getirdi. İlave kuvvetler toplayan kâfir tarikatı, karşı saldırıya geçti. Öfkeden deliye dönen soysuz sürüleri, sabotajlar, patlamalar ve çatışmalar; hanedanlığın en iyi hizmetkârları arasından binlercesinin canını aldı. Ancak yaşananların sonu önceden belliydi ve kâfirlerin pislik içindeki mabetleri ateşe verildi.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The next planetary cycle brought heavy losses for Dargonus. Mustering additional forces, the heretic cult struck back. The raging hordes of degenerates, sabotage, explosions, and skirmishes claimed the lives of thousands of the dynasty's best servants. But the outcome was predetermined, and the filthy shrines of the heretics were set ablaze.{/n}
